test_your_xhosa_knowledge: Leka tsebo ea hau ea Xhosa le Sazi le lelapa la hae pele u kenella lithutong tsa rona tse monate le tse sebetsanang! Khetha boemo ba hau, araba lipotso tse 'maloa, kapa u senole likarabo ho qala ho ithuta hona joale.
select_your_xhosa_level: Khetha boemo ba hau ba Xhosa
beginner_no_or_basic_knowledge: Ea Qalang (Ha e na kapa Tsebo ea Motheo)
what_is_in_xhosa: Ke eng e reng "{{english}}" ka Xhosa?
nice_try_correct_answer: U lekile hantle! Karabo e nepahetseng ke {{answer}}.
test_your_xhosa_knowledge_full: Leka tsebo ea hau ea Xhosa le Sazi le lelapa la hae pele u kenella lithutong tsa rona tse monate le tse sebetsanang! Ho Saz’ isiXhosa, no Sapho, re mema baithuti ba lilemo tsohle ho hlahloba botle ba puo ea Xhosa le setso. Khetha boemo ba hau—ea qalang, mahareng, kapa setsebi/sebuelli sa letsoalloa—'me u arabe lipotso tse 'maloa ho lekanya bokhoni ba hau. U ka boela ua senola likarabo ho qala ho ithuta hang-hang.
our_site_offers: Sebaka sa rona sa marang-rang se fana ka sebaka se mofuthu, se khahlang ho ithuta ka mantsoe, lipolelo, linomoro, sebopeho sa puo, le litsebo tsa setso. Ho tloha thabong ea Ukuxoxa Iintsomi (ho pheta lipale) ho ea ho bokhoni ba puo bo sebetsang, re kopanya lefa le thuto ea sejoale-joale. Hlahloba karolo ea rona ea Setso bakeng sa lipale tsa Transkei kapa leka Mesebetsi ea rona ho etsa hore thuto e be monate. Ha re bolokeng Xhosa e phela hammoho!
